td.content: s:a 60 yr old F weatherman with Body Aches. she has had several such episodes over past 2 years. she drinks 2 beers per night denies any smoking o:Height 157 cm, Weight 70.4 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 17 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed duloxetine - 60 mg daily, and ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel.

s:a 61 yo female weatherman with C/O mild frequent urination, severe blurred vision and moderate blurred vision. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 5 years in her past Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 157 cm, Weight 70.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, Pelvic = no tenderness or mass, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, obese with NAD a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed LANTUS - 100 UNITS/ML subcutaneous daily, and ordered HbA1c.

td.content: s:female weatherman aged 62 ys presents with Body Aches. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 71.4 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed CYMBALTA - 30 mg daily, and ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel.
